com.gordonwong.materialsheetfab

Class MaterialSheetFab<FAB extends android.view.View & AnimatedFab>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.gordonwong.materialsheetfab.MaterialSheetFab<FAB>

  • public class MaterialSheetFab<FAB extends android.view.View & AnimatedFab>
extends java.lang.Object
    Created by Gordon Wong on 7/9/2015. Handles the interactions between the FAB and the material sheet that the FAB morphs into.

      • MaterialSheetFab

        public MaterialSheetFab(FAB fab,
                        android.view.View sheet,
                        android.view.View overlay,
                        int sheetColor,
                        int fabColor)
        Creates a MaterialSheetFab instance and sets up the necessary click listeners.
        Parameters:
        fab - The FAB view.
        sheet - The sheet view.
        overlay - The overlay view.
        sheetColor - The background color of the material sheet.
        fabColor - The background color of the FAB.
